item.description:
Our last event had over 60 singles participating and we had a blast!

Come join us for a fun way to meet other singles, with pre-event mingling, complimentary appetizers along with a cash bar featuring Orleans' great martinis and selection of beers.

You'll have four 8-minute one-on-one conversations with four single professionals followed by an intermission where you can meet other singles that you may be interested in. After the intermission, you'll have another four 8-minute dates.

We're so confident that 8minuteDating will work for you, that if you don't meet someone you want to see again, your next event is on us! What are you waiting for, sign up today!

Advance registration is required for this event, so register here:

Ages 25-35: http://8minutedating.com/signup/eventDescription.cgi?EID=20505

Ages 35-45: http://8minutedating.com/signup/eventDescription.cgi?EID=20516

Use the discount code 8mdnurahm20359 to get $8 off your first event!

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: 8minute Speed Dating at Orleans, Davis Square (Registration Required)
